title: 潮趣科技本 - 宝藏工具集
description: 精心收集了各类实用工具，一起开启科技的奇妙之旅，创造更加美好的未来！
keywords: 导航,宝藏工具,实用工具,开发编程,网络工具
headerContent:
<script async src="/assets/js/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script async src="/assets/js/ripple.min.js"></script>

<script>
  // 异步加载并预加载关键资源
  var preloadStyles = document.createElement('link');
  preloadStyles.rel = 'stylesheet';
  preloadStyles.href = '/assets/css/styles.b2f85e592e1bfcef.css';
  document.head.appendChild(preloadStyles);

  var preloadScript1 = document.createElement('script');
  preloadScript1.src = '/assets/js/main.3fa8d9d70d6f1281.js';
  preloadScript1.async = true;
  document.head.appendChild(preloadScript1);

  var preloadScript2 = document.createElement('script');
  preloadScript2.src = '/assets/js/polyfills.7f693caae71ae1c1.js';
  preloadScript2.async = true;
  document.head.appendChild(preloadScript2);

  var preloadScript3 = document.createElement('script');
  preloadScript3.src = '/assets/js/runtime.a9137d191ff9f30b.js';
  preloadScript3.async = true;
  document.head.appendChild(preloadScript3);
</script>

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    var lazyImages = document.querySelectorAll("img.lazy");

    lazyImages.forEach(function(lazyImage) {
      if ("IntersectionObserver" in window) {
        let lazyImageObserver = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries, observer) {
          entries.forEach(function(entry) {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
              let lazyImage = entry.target;
              lazyImage.src = lazyImage.dataset.src;
              lazyImage.classList.remove("lazy");
              lazyImageObserver.unobserve(lazyImage);
            }
          });
        });

        lazyImageObserver.observe(lazyImage);
      } else {
        lazyImage.src = lazyImage.dataset.src;
        lazyImage.classList.remove("lazy");
      }
    });
  });
</script>
footerContent:
